data.event: Miami is a community in southern Manitoba, Canada which was formed in 1885.

event.title: were stolen just before Christmas Day

data.event: All of the town's signs, a total of 44, were stolen just before Christmas Day; total replacement cost was about $7,000 CAD.

event.title: was used in a controversial prank contest by Winnipeg radio station Classic Rock 97.5 FM (CJKR) morning man Scruff Connors in 1995

data.event: Miami was used in a controversial prank contest by Winnipeg radio station Classic Rock 97.5 FM (CJKR) morning man Scruff Connors in 1995.
Because of the negative backlash of the prank, CJKR terminated Connors' contract within days of the incident.
